author: .paulharris
content:
Updating some numbers on watermarks, have changed the report so it can do last 30 days...
```
Without Watermarks (30d): 73.09% (157154)
Including Watermarks (30d): 26.91% (57851)
CL Clients Found (30d):
Grandine      0.03% (18)
Lighthouse   55.34% (32009)
Lodestar      2.54% (1471)
Teku         42.09% (24346)

EL Clients Found (30d):
Besu         15.53% (8980)
Erigon        0.07% (38)
go-ethereum  50.77% (29362)
Nethermind   31.58% (18261)
Reth          2.06% (1192)
```
Watermarks percentage and teku percentage have moved down compared to all time (i didn't include all time), which is probably partly our fulu issues.
I can't wait for prysm to release their opt-out, as I think thats ultimately what we need across more clients to get better numbers...
Looking at lighthouse, they're only populating if the graffiti isn't set, so if they defaulted append on, their large % would go up further. I don't see *any* appends so potentially its not implemented for lighthouse even to opt in...
Lodestar also is basically only populating if graffiti is empty.
EL data looks relatively stable and representative, but CL data is heavily skewed and should be taken with a grain of salt (its pretty accepted LH is over 33% and teku is around 10-15%).
